title: Real Neon Sign Creator
description: Create realistic and customizable Neon Signs easily! 3 Modes incl. On / Flash / Flicker (Seeded Random Character)
longDescription:
Need to whip up a realistic Neon Sign in a flash?

Drop in the Neon Sign Creator Blueprint, enter your text, choose a color and mode and you're good to go.



Have a little more time and are feeling creative? Let's do it.

Drop in the Neon Spline Line Blueprint and create everything from outlines for your sign, to emoji art, to Japanese Kanji or Arabic letters.


Introduction Video: https://youtu.be/RlkPqy4LDOA

Discord Support: https://discord.gg/6qVCQeU


Within a few minutes you can have a customized, realistic neon sign in your scene.

Add a touch of realness by switching on flicker mode which randomly selects a character and flickers it on and off, even better, this is seeded so it will be the same each time you run your game.


You have the flexibility to create horizontal lettered signs, vertical lettered, rotated characters and completely custom signs using the Neon Spline Line Blueprint. Search Google for some inspiration and go forth and create whatever you like.


Also check out my other product Real LED Sign Creator! If you're looking for an easy way to create unlimited LED and Digital Sign designs for your game or visualization.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Easy to use, realistic Neon Sign Creator
  •  Realistic Neon tubes have inner emissive material and outer glass material and insulating stand-offs.
  •  Holds up to close inspection, perfect for cinematics
  • Fully LODed with the HighDetail profile
  • Very customizable text formatting options, color, emissive boost, spacing horizontal and vertical, rotation etc
  • 4 Modes Total; On / Flash / Flicker (Seeded Random Letter) / Off
  • Lightweight - nothing runs on tick, even in flicker / flash mode.


Texture Sizes:

  •  No textures required

UV Unwrapped:

  • Yes, Automatic unwrapping only (to satisfy marketplace requirements)

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Collision: Automatically generated

Vertex Count: Ranges from 578 - 2000+ at LOD 0, depending on the character

LODs: 5 (Characters only)

Number of Meshes: 44

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 4 Materials and 4 Material Instances

Number of Textures: 0

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Steam VR / HTC Vive, Oculus, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5, Xbox One, Android, iOS, PS4, Windows, Mac

Documentation: https://youtu.be/RlkPqy4LDOA

Important/Additional Notes: You can build any character you like using the Neon Spline Line Blueprint. Included ready-typable characters are: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ 0123456789 &@$!?"
